subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Huntington Beach, Calif., defeated Billings, Mont., 11-2, to win the United States bracket of the Little League World Series on Saturday and will face Japan in the final.
snippet: Huntington Beach, Calif., defeated Billings, Mont., 11-2, to win the United States bracket of the Little League World Series on Saturday and will face Japan in the final.
